bioconda.name: bedtk
bioconda.summary: Bedtk is a set of simple tools to process BED files.

biotools.summary: Bedtk is a set of simple tools to process BED files. It so far implements intersection, subtraction, sorting, merging and computing the breadth of coverage.

bioschemas.name: bedtk
bioschemas.summary: Bedtk is a set of simple tools to process BED files. It so far implements intersection, subtraction, sorting, merging and computing the breadth of coverage.
